channel.title: Got false banned today and now /r/2007scape hates me
channel.description:
Original thread: https://www.reddit.com/r/2007scape/comments/470vnn/worstbotever_w386_yew_cutter_my_alternative/
Mod Mat K's response: https://www.reddit.com/r/2007scape/comments/470vnn/worstbotever_w386_yew_cutter_my_alternative/d0aijxh?context=3
Me: "I would at least like to know what drew you to this conclusion."
Him: "Many people would, but to answer that question I would need to tell you how our bot detection system works. I am not going to do that."
Me: :palm:

item.title: Got false banned today and now /r/2007scape hates me
item.dc:creator: @Rodgerwilco Rodgerwilco
item.description:
@Rodgerwilco wrote:

I saw this on reddit and now I am surprised to see it’s someone from this community. ROFL.

Jagex is a communist fucking party.

Read full topic

item.title: Got false banned today and now /r/2007scape hates me
item.dc:creator: @Travas Travas
item.description:
@Travas wrote:

yeah oyster glitch was fun

Another fun one was when jagex added grotesque souls. took a few hours but everyone realized you can sell them to the general store for 2k each even though ge value was auto set at 7.5k. made about 20m off of that, i was lucky enough to get off the hook without a ban.

Read full topic

item.title: Got false banned today and now /r/2007scape hates me
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Dunno about OSRS but they’re a lot more strict on RS3 imho. People abused an oyster glitch and every trace of xp/items that was gained from it went poof. Literally happened within hours of the glitch being discovered. Some accounts got banned, as they abused the glitch heavily.

Read full topic
item.source: Got false banned today and now /r/2007scape hates me

item.title: Got false banned today and now /r/2007scape hates me
item.dc:creator: @Jarvistude Jarvistude
item.description:
@Jarvistude wrote:

Something sounds very fishy about this…

In terms of - They do! I have botted plenty of times in the past and I did the same thing with logs as it happens transferred it over to my main bot got banned, they took the last set of logs i transferred over and also reverted coins back to what it was before i sold the bulk of them off.

So why wouldn’t they do the same to him, unless it was a false positive I can not see any reason why not, they also reverted my construction level down because i had already used some of the money in purchasing items for that skill to level up on the main…

very strange

Read full topic
item.source: Got false banned today and now /r/2007scape hates me

[quote=“ox random xi, post:23, topic:554817”][quote author=Death Style link=topic=673740.msg4504936#msg4504936 date=1456368529]
I feel like they could better enforce no botting by removing the rewards of botting… letting you keep the logs just sounds like you can bot on an alt and not worry about consequences
[/quote]i was about to say, i’m surprised they dont ban the main for having all those ‘false’ logs.[/quote]

it only proves how lazy the people are at jagex who do the whole ‘account verification’ process they like to call it.

item.title: Got false banned today and now /r/2007scape hates me
item.dc:creator: @nolan2131 nolan2131
item.description:
@nolan2131 wrote:

I hate to be the bearer of bad news to everyone, but he was botting.

The only question I really have is that as both of us know you were botting and you’ve put a fair amount of effort into the account, why did you bot? Was it just to create this situation or had chopping trees for so long driven you to desperation?

Mat K is a savage. Straight up roasting you and calling you out, lmao.

Read full topic

item.title: Got false banned today and now /r/2007scape hates me
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

tbh jagex should just allow bots because 13.4m exp for level 99 is worth a terrorist attack up their ass

edit: @op: just say it flat out nigga, did you bot or not?

if not, knowing jagex you’re not getting your account back. best thing you can do is probably sell your shit, transfer the cash to another acc and beg the devil they don’t ban your main to which you’ve been transferring the logs

also, any jagex subr is pure cocksuckery. stay clear from those when discussing anything violating their terms or that is considered ‘taboo’

item.source: Got false banned today and now /r/2007scape hates me

item.title: Got false banned today and now /r/2007scape hates me
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

imo the reason they’re not transparent about bot detection is that parts of it have a % chance that it’ll throw false positives and they can’t be bothered deciding which excuses to accept. i’m guessing most bots don’t do any of the easy shit anymore (like clicking the exact same coordinate or pixel colour) so they have to rely on stuff like playing for 48 hours straight, meaning they have to accept a % of people get falsely banned. i find it a bit strange that so many people on reddit have 100% faith in what jagex are saying when there’s no way any system could determine who’s botting with 100% accuracy.

Read full topic
item.source: Got false banned today and now /r/2007scape hates me

I still don’t know why they wouldn’t unban you if you were actually not banning. They would just take the heat I believe, I don’t think they’d keep you falsely banned. You must have been doing something sketchy. The whole ‘inticing’ people to report you probably didn’t help, or help your case

item.source: Got false banned today and now /r/2007scape hates me

item.title: Got false banned today and now /r/2007scape hates me
item.dc:creator: @z z
item.description:
@z wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:2, topic:554817”]So either:
A) You were botting but you’re in hella denial.

or B) Their bot detection system is actually garbage, flagged you as a false positive, and they rolled with it in an attempt to make themselves look better.[/quote]B. I’ve only botted on RSC with APOS because they don’t monitor RSC, but I know they actively monitor OSRS so it would fudgeing stupid to bot knowing they will ban you. Some people have the audacity to think that I would suddenly start botting just now after working on the account for a couple years. Go figure.

The only thing that changed between now and the last several months of playing was that I played unusual hours over the last month or so due to shit sleep schedule from getting back to university.

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:8, topic:554817”][quote author=ox random xi link=topic=673740.msg4504862#msg4504862 date=1456257716]
we’ll never know if you actually botted, but who knows. Not to be on the side of corporate, I don’t see why they would lie if they did get a false detection.
[/quote]
Because in this particular case, it would look bad on their system if players knew that it does false positive players as bots. That would cause a huge influx of people asking “jegex unban me pls, I didn’t bot” - and also “jegex reset the xp you rolled me back”.
The other cases when it threw a false positive, it was on a much larger scale so Jagex was more than willing to take the blame, because it was too obvious and if they didn’t fix it, they’d have lost their players. (Example being when they enabled bot watch and it massed banned thousands)[/quote]That’s my theory. I think the issue really is just that I created such a massive influx of interest in the thread that they decided to go with the instinct that led me to suffer the consequence of their system flagging me wrong. I could have probably gotten unbanned had I appealed in a more quiet manner. Oh well.

At least my other alt that I use to do MLM mining isn’t banned.

Read full topic
item.source: Got false banned today and now /r/2007scape hates me

item.dc:creator: @ox_random_xi ox random xi
item.description:
@ox_random_xi wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:10, topic:554817”]bot in name - check

default outfit - check

tons of xp - check

It’s like you were asking for it whether you did or didn’t bot. Your pictures hardly prove anything except every now and then you may have babysat your bot and talked to people.

What was your play time looking like? I bet the biggest giveaway would be the weekly play pattern[/quote]if you read any of the reddit posts, he would play frequently while also playing his main. This added to his ‘bot behavior’ but he was also going for that - almost encouraging people to report him.

Read full topic

item.source: Got false banned today and now /r/2007scape hates me

item.title: Got false banned today and now /r/2007scape hates me
item.dc:creator: @ox_random_xi ox random xi
item.description:
@ox_random_xi wrote:

They have never said their detection is 100% correct. They agree that they do have human reviewers that can have human incorrectness. With that in mind, they have undone bans before. It’s not like Valve with their VAC system.
I do agree that, even Z said this on his few posts, that if they unbanned him more people would flood saying that they were false detection. He also had two JMods reply, with one saying there would be a review.
I don’t know the JMods anymore, haven’t played the game since '09, so I don’t know who Mat K is or the person that said there will be a review.

Read full topic
item.source: Got false banned today and now /r/2007scape hates me

item.title: Got false banned today and now /r/2007scape hates me
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

ox random xi:

we’ll never know if you actually botted, but who knows. Not to be on the side of corporate, I don’t see why they would lie if they did get a false detection.

Because in this particular case, it would look bad on their system if players knew that it does false positive players as bots. That would cause a huge influx of people asking “jegex unban me pls, I didn’t bot” - and also “jegex reset the xp you rolled me back”.
The other cases when it threw a false positive, it was on a much larger scale so Jagex was more than willing to take the blame, because it was too obvious and if they didn’t fix it, they’d have lost their players. (Example being when they enabled bot watch and it massed banned thousands)

Read full topic
item.source: Got false banned today and now /r/2007scape hates me

item.title: Got false banned today and now /r/2007scape hates me
item.dc:creator: @Travas Travas
item.description:
@Travas wrote:

[quote=“ox random xi, post:6, topic:554817”]I don’t see why they would lie if they did get a false detection.[/quote]Because that would further prove the instability of their detection system and go against all the times they said there can be no false positives.

The system they have right now is very good compared to what they had years ago, but Jagex saying there can be no false bans is just moronic.

Anyway, I have no doubts that the system very well could of given a false positive for botting, but I also don’t doubt the fact that there was actually botting done on the account.

Read full topic
